Explanation:

* apoptotic cell death: Apoptosis is a process of programmed cell death that occurs in multicellular organisms. In the context of the paragraph, it refers to the death of brain cells.
* post synaptic neurotoxicity: Neurotoxicity refers to damage to the nervous system. In this case, it specifically refers to damage to the post-synaptic region of the neuron, which is the part of the neuron that receives signals from other neurons.
